short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kindle Books of the Day, Nook Books of the Day and Kobo Books of the Day are directly in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free! 

Books of the Day brings you the best Kindle, Nook and Kobo books. 

Note: You'll need the separate Kindle, Nook and Kobo Apps to read the books. 

Books of the Day brings you - 

1) The very best free kindle book(s) each day. 

2) The very best free nook book(s) each week. 

3) The very best free kobo book(s) each week. 

4) The very best kindle book deal(s) each day. 

5) The very best nook book deal(s) each day. 

6) The very best kobo book deal(s) each day. 

Note: You MUST check the prices at the Amazon and B&N websites BEFORE buying the book. Please check the prices at the website. Prices change all the time. The Amazon and B&N websites are the only final price reference. 

Note: Only Kindle Store, Nook Store and Kobo Store are supported. 

Note: You can filter by genre. However, filtering out genres will greatly reduce the number of books you see. It's advised to choose all genres. 

Note: Amazon, Kindle, Kindle Fire, Kindle Store are all Amazon trademarks. Nook, B&N, Nook HD, Nook Store are all Barnes and Noble trademarks. Kobo, kobobooks.com and related words, domain names and logos are trade-marks and the property of Kobo Inc. They are only used to illustrate what this app is about. 

Books of the Day brings you the very best books every day - Get it now!
